subject: Pedals fault
description_text: Hi Iv recently bought my pedals but the hydraulic rod from the throttle is leaking fluid is this a part that can be sent out for me to replace or do I need to return the pedal it’s self my order number is Orders Order #SSN2446 Look forward to hearing from you

conversations.body_text: Hi Mick,  Please provide your contact name, address, and phone number, and we will send you a replacement one-way hydraulic rod for the throttle.
Thanks it’s Mick birnie 19 wellington road Stevenage Herts Sg29hr 07855667717
Morning Iv not received the part yet can you confirm if this has been sent out yet please
Hi Iv not received this part yet could you please update me with if this has been sent
Hi Mick,    Sorry for the delay in processing your request. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047246223178
